title: Avon Anew Reversalist Illuminating Eye System
description: A Prevention Defy your Age Beauty Award winner for the Eye Cream category. Brightens even your darkest undereye area. Two-part eye system with Activinol Eye Technology. Helps reactivate skin's repair processes and dramatically reverse visible wrinkles. Instantly: eye area appears more luminous. In 4 weeks: dramatically reduces the look of fine wrinkles. Sheer veil with potent skin brighteners. Illuminates undereye area instantly. Use after eye cream and reapply as needed. .09 oz. net wt. Eye cream: visibly repairs dark, circles, fine lines and wrinkles over time. Use twice a day all over eye area. .5 fl. oz.

title: Avon Anew Genics Night Treatment Cream 1.0oz/30g
AVANI Timeless Mineral Eye Cream For all skin types 50 ml / 1.7 fl.oz.
description:
Enriched with natural plant extracts, vitamin E and collagen, this lightly textured eye cream has been formulated by combining the pure, rejuvenating minerals of the Dead Sea with a blend of plant extracts, essential oils, collagen & vitamin E.

Size: 1.7 Fl. Oz. / 50 ml.
Made in Israel.

This choice, natural ingredients are renowned for their anti-aging, anti oxidant and moisturizing qualities and when regularly applied to the delicate skin around the eye, these active ingredients help to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and puffiness to promote a fresher, more youthful glow.

Directions: Apply to the eye area, gently tapping it with tour fingertips until absorbed.
